title: Beta Android 12,Launcher,pattern password.
content: after updating to beta android 12, I had a problem with corrupted files after a couple of attempts to try to start it again, I had to reset it to factory settings, but now after I enter my old password, it drops me to the previous page and does not allow me to go further, not setting up through another phone or trying to log in through a google account (again asks for a password endlessly)
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
